tool_description: Determines optimal send times for review requests based on customer behavior patterns, time zones, and engagement data.

customer_ids.description: List of customer IDs to optimize timing for

campaign_start_date.description: Earliest date to start sending requests

error_messages: Empty customer list: customer_ids array cannot be empty.
Invalid date range: campaign_start_date must be before campaign_end_date and both must be in the future.
Invalid date format: Dates must be in valid ISO 8601 format.
Insufficient time window: Campaign window must be at least 1 day long.
Customer data unavailable: Unable to retrieve engagement patterns for timing optimization.
usage: Provide customer IDs and campaign date range to get optimal send times for each customer. The tool considers time zones and historical engagement patterns.

optimized_send_times.description: Optimal send times for each customer in date-time format

confidence_scores.description: Confidence scores (0-1) for each timing recommendation
